original_text: Even if you only eat a little of his food, it will make you sick. All your nice words to him will be useless.
korean_text: 네가 조금 먹은 것도 토하겠고 네 아름다운 말도 헛된 데로 돌아가리라

sentences.original_text: Even if you only eat a little of his food
All your nice words to him
sentences.korean_translation: 그에게 하는 당신의 모든 좋은 말은
